characters.story: "CHING!" the deer, flattened clothes hanger, heart, and walking legs command sharply - to celebrate, rejoice at festivals!
"JYEN!" the flowers command sharply - to recommend, endorse, and suggest!
"JYEH?" the person questions curiously - outstanding, excellent, and exceptional?
"SHWUN!" the eyes command sharply - an instant, moment, and flash!
"LIN?" the deer and jack o' lantern question curiously - Chinese unicorn, mythical at carp tower?
"LYEN?" the state of mind questions curiously - to pity, sympathize with compassion?
"LIN?" the city walls question curiously - a neighbor, adjacent, and nearby?
"SHAI!" the sun commands sharply - to bask, dry, and hang clothes!
The water bends down drooping - to spill, splash voluminously, and flow.
"BAH," he says neutrally - to cease, stop, and quit.
The fingers bend down drooping - to put in order, arrange, and display.
"CHWUN?" the sign of dragon and mouth question curiously - lips, thirsty, and ruptured?
"ROO!" he commands sharply - disgrace, shame, insult, and scold!
"JUN!" it commands sharply - to quake, tremble in an earthquake!
"JUN!" he commands sharply - to vibrate, shake - calm down and rest!
"PWOH!" it commands sharply - vigor, spirit, and soul that's sucked!
"HWAI?" the tree and ghost question curiously - scholar tree, locust wood?
"MAY!" the ghost commands sharply though not yet - to enchant, charm with special allure!
